p: Bradford assay [ 36] was carried out to quantify the total protein levels in each sample, using bovine serum albumin as standard. The protein concentrations were expressed as g/dL. Cholesterol, triglycerides, and glucose were measured using commercial colorimetric kits following manufacturer instructions (FAR S.r.l., Pescantina, VR, Italy), and concentrations were reported as mg/dL. Each sample analysis was performed in triplicate.
